english.segment1: All of You is more than enough for. All of me for every thirst and every need. You satisfy me with Your love. And all I have in You. Is more than enough
english.segment2: You are my supply. My breath of life. Still more awesome than I know. You are my reward. Worth living for. Still more awesome than I know
english.segment3: You're my sacrifice of greatest price. Still more awesome than I know. You're my coming King You're everything. Still more awesome than I know
